programme.desc: Mõrvatakse rokkstaar, kellest tehti parasjagu dokumentaalfilmi. Võtteruhm jatkab ka Becketti ja Castlei juurdluse filmimist.

programme.title: Vares
programme.desc: Hingesugulased Eric ja Shelly mõrvatakse jõhkralt. Ericule antakse võimalus ennast ohverdades paasta oma eluarmastus, seega ta hakkab kattemaksu otsima, reisides elavate ja surnute maailmas, et kord majja luua.

programme.title: Surnud ei tunne valu
programme.desc: Kaks teerajajat võitlevad kodusõja ajal Ameerika piiril oma elu ja armastuse eest.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Oscari-võitja Kate Winslet kehastab Ameerika sõjakorrespondenti Lee Millerit, kelle ainulaadne anne ja aaretu sihikindlus tõid meieni 20. sajandi kõige unustamatumad pildid.

programme.title: Kasilased
programme.desc: USA / Jaapan / Prantsusmaa 2015 animakomoodia EESTI KEELES! Lavastaja: Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin Osades(haaled):Priit Võigemast Scarleti abikaasana, Tiina Tauraite kuningannana, Mart Avandi Walter Nelsonina, Haide Mannamae Madge Nelsonina, Maiken Schmidt Tina Nelsonina, Priit Pius Professor Fluxina, Tanel Saar Walter Nelson juuniorina, Ain Jurisson Krooni valvurina, jutustaja rollis on Tõnu Mikiver. Kasilased arenesid juba aegade alguses ainuraksetest kollastest organismidest ning nende eesmark on teisi teenida, ent nad on sattunud jarjest mitme edutu isanda teenistusse -turannosaurustest Napoleonini valja. Ilma isandata, keda teenida, langevad kasilased sugavasse masendusse. Ent uhel kasilasel, Kevinil, on plaan. Ta siirdub koos oma semude Stuarti ja Bobiga otsima uut kurja bossi, kellele ta siis koos kaaslastega alluda saaks. Otsingud viivad neid Scarlet Overkillini - maailma esimese naissoost supervargani.

programme.title: Peletiste perekond 2
programme.desc: Mida uuemat on peletiste maailmas? Pulm! Baaba-Jagaa ja tema kallim Renfield, krahv Dracula teener, otsustasid oma tundeid mitte varjata ja... lasta end laulatada! Aga tseremoonia ei jõua alatagi, kui see tuleb katkestada! Kõigi kulaliste silme all roovib armunud noorpaari uleloomulike võimetega peletisekutt Mila Starr. Selgub, et vaike roovija on miljardarist teadlase ainuke tutar ja taidab oma hullu isa antud ulesannet! Sellest lapsukesest tasub eemale hoida - ta on kiire kui tuul ja varustatud selliste abivahenditega, mida kadestaks ka James Bond ise!

programme.title: Monumendimehed
programme.desc: USA-Saksamaa 2014 sõjafilmLavastaja: George ClooneyOsades: George Clooney, Matt Damon, Bill Murray, Cate Blanchett, John Goodman, Jean Dujardin. Bob Balaban, Hugh BonnevillePõhineb tõestisundinud lool, mille keskmes on teadaolevalt suurim aardejaht inimkonna ajaloos. Nimelt pannakse Teise maailmasõja lõppjargus kokku usnagi eriskummaline ruhm, mis ei koosne sedapuhku erivaljaõppega dessantvaelastest, vaid hoopiski kunstiajaloolastest ja muuseumidirektoritest ja kuraatoritest, kellele Ameerika Ühendriikide president usaldab vagagi vastutusrikka ulesande: minna Saksamaale, et leida Hitleri kasul roovitud hindamatud kunstiteosed ning tagastada need nende õigusjargsetele omanikele. Tegemist on pealtnaha ilmvõimatu missiooniga, sest tagaotsitavad šedoovrid paiknevad sugaval vaenlase tagalas ning Kolmanda Reichi viimetel paevadel võib taganevale saksa armeele iga hetk saabuda kask taiesed havitada. Kuidas tulevad selle ulesandega toime mehed, kes on rohkem tuttavad Michelangelo toodega, kui granaatide ja kuulipildujatega? Kartmatud "monumendimehed" leiavad end keset sõjamollu ning riskivad eluga, et paasta inimkonna suurimaid kultuurivaartusi.

programme.title: Hullud kapad
programme.desc: Hank on koer, kellel on ilmselt maailmas kõige vahem vedanud. Ta elab juba ammu linna kõige ohtlikumas rajoonis, satub pidevalt konfliktidesse jalkide tanavakoertega ja saab neilt pidevalt kere peale. Lisaks sellele ei võta keegi Hanki tõsiselt ja isegi sõbrad ei toeta tema suurimat unistust - saada tõeliseks võitluskunstide meistriks, samuraiks. Aga kõik poordub pea peale, kui Hank juhuslikult satub veidrasse Kakamucho linna, kus elavad ainult kassid!

programme.title: Mina, supervaras 3
programme.desc: USA / Prantsusmaa / Jaapan 2018 animakomoodia Lavastaja:Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin Osades (haaled): Tiit Sukk, Liina Vahtrik, Margus Tabor, Maria Klenskaja, Elo-Mirt Oja, Loviise Võigemast, Emma Tross, Taavi Teplenkov, Piret Krumm, Kalju Orro, Marten Manniste jt. Kolmas peatukk vaikeste ja suurte kinosõprade poolt palavalt armastatud "Mina, supervaras" tegelaste loos viib Gru (Tiit Sukk) tema suureks ullatuseks kokku ulirikka ja kaunijuukselise kaksikvenna Druga (samuti Tiit Sukk), kes veenab Grud taas pahalaseks hakkama. Just siis on linna asunud terroriseerima ulivastikuid roosasid natsumulle tulistav superpahalane Balthazar Bratt (Taavi Teplenkov) - endine 80ndate laps-staar, kelle moemaitse on ajast ja arust ning tantsusammud kohutavalt vanamoodsad. Kes saakski olla õigem vastane kaabakat kinni võtma, kui Gru koos oma armsa Lucy (Liina Vahtrik) ja ustavate kollaste kasilaste armeega? Mis põhjustel aga kasilased vangi satuvad, miks Gru oma kaksikvennast midagi ei teadnud ja milliseks vellekeste suhted kujunevad, selgub juba kinosaalis.

programme.title: Maria
programme.desc: Oscari-võitja Angelina Jolie kehastab tunnustatud lavastaja Pablo Larraini ooperilikus filmis 20. sajandi ikoonilisimat lauljat Maria Callast. Film raagib Ameerika Kreeka juurtega soprani elust Pariisis parast glamuurset ja tormilist avalikku elu. Biograafiline draama kujutleb legendaarse soprani viimaseid paevi, mil diiva oma identiteedi ja elu ule jarele mõtles.

programme.title: Elu maitse
programme.desc: Romantiline draama, mis paneb suu vett jooksma igal vaatajal! "Elu maitse" raagib Maggist (Katrine Greis-Rosenthal, "Sild") ja Carstenist (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, "Troonide mang"). Nad on edukas abielupaar, kes peavad koos tipptasemel restorani. Nende ulim eesmark on võita oma restoranile Michelini taht. Kuidas aga meeletult tood rabades oma suhet elusana hoida, naib olevat miljoni dollari kusimus...

programme.title: Ford vs Ferrari
programme.desc: Oscari-võitjad Matt Damon ja Christian Bale kehastavad peaosi selles tõsielul põhinevas põnevas loos ajast, mil Ford Ferrari vastu sõtta laks. See on lugu lennuka visiooniga autoehitajast Carroll Shelbyst (Damon) ja kartmatust võidusõitjast Ken Milesist (Bale), kes trotsisid suurkorporatsiooni burokraatiat, fuusikaseadusi ja isiklikke deemoneid, et ehitada Ford Motor Company jaoks revolutsiooniline võidusõiduauto, millega minna vastu Enzo Ferrari loodud võidukatele neljarattalistele Prantsusmaal, legendaarsel Le Mansi 24 tunni võidusõidul.

programme.title: Visa hing 5
programme.sub-title: Visa hing 5: Hea paev, et surra
programme.desc: Bruce Willis naaseb ekraanile oma kõige ikoonilisema rolliga, kehastades taas kord John McClanei - tõelist, luust ja lihast kangelast, kellel olemas vajalik oskustepagas ja suhtumine selleks, et mistahes olukorrast omal jalal võitjana valjuda. Sel korral on sõnadele tegusid eelistav New Yorgi võmm tõepoolest sattunud valel ajal valesse kohta, olles reisinud Moskvasse, et aidata oma poega Jacki (Jai Courtney), kellega tal pole viimasel ajal olnud just kõige soojemad suhted. Olukorras, kus nende kannul on pealtnaha terve Venemaa allmaailm ning kaalukausil pole midagi vahemat kui maailma paastmine, avastavad kaks põlvkonda McClanei mehi, et nende usna vastandlikud meetodid toimivad raskes olukorras võrdselt hasti. Nagu isa, nii ka poeg. Visadus on parilik.

programme.title: Advokaat
programme.desc: USA-Suurbritannia 2013 thrillerLavastaja: Ridley ScottOsades: Brad Pitt, Javier Bardem, Michael Fassbender, Penelope Cruz, Cameron Diaz "Advokaat" on tumedates toonides pingeline põnevusfilm edukast juristist (Michael Fassbender), kes otsustab siduda end narkokaubandusega, andmata endale aru tagajargedest, mida selline valik kaasa toob.

programme.title: Kõik me võõrad
programme.desc: Loo keskmes on uksildane stsenarist Adam, kelle ellu astub uhel hetkel salaparane majanaaber Harry ja korrapealt on Adami rutiin lootusetult segamini aetud. Mida lahedasemaks Adam ja Harry saavad, seda enam kisub Adamit mingi sisemine tung tema lapsepõlvekodu poole. Kui ta võtab uhel õhtul lõpuks ette teekonna lapsepõlve radadele ja jõuab tuttava valimusega majani, on tema jahmatus suur, kui selgub, et tema ema ja isa – kes surid, kui ta oli kõigest 12-aastane – elavad endiselt kunagises kodus ja naevad valja sama vanad nagu Adami lapsepõlves.

programme.title: Karm paar
programme.desc: USA 2013 marulikomoodia Lavastaja: Paul Feig Osades: Melissa McCarthy, Sandra Bullock, Marlon Wayans, Michael Rapaport, Demian Bichir Kõikvõimalikest eeskirjadest rangelt kinnipidav kuivikust FBI agent Sarah Ashburn (Sandra Bullock) ja ropusuine Bostoni politseinik Shannon Mullins (Melissa McCarthy) ei saaks olla erinevamad. Ent kui nad uhendavad jõud, tabamaks julma narkoparunit, saab neist kahest midagi sellist, mida keegi oodatagi ei osanud: sõbrad.

programme.title: Jeanne du Barry, kuninga favoriit
programme.desc: "Jeanne du Barry, kuninga favoriit" on suurejooneline prantsuse kostuumidraama, uhtlasi ka tanavuse Cannesi filmifestivali avafilm ja filmi uheks peaosataitjaks on Johnny Depp. Jeanne, noor kultuuri- ja naudingunaljas toolisnaine, kasutab oma intelligentsust ja ahvatlust, et tõusta samm-sammult uhiskonna kõrgeimale tasemele. Temast saab kuningas Louis XV lemmik, kes taastab tanu temale oma eluisu. Nad armuvad meeletult ning Jeanne kolib igasuguse etiketi vastaselt Versaillessse, kus tema suhe kuningaga tekitab õukonnas skandaali.

programme.title: Minu sõber panda
programme.desc: 12-aastane Tian saadetakse halbade hinnete parast vanaema juurde elama. Linnast kaugel salaparastes Hiina magedes sõbruneb ta pandaga, kellele paneb nimeks Kuu. Sellega saab alguse hammastav seiklus, mis muudab Tiani ja tema perekonna elu igaveseks.

programme.title: Uhke printsess
programme.desc: Noorel ja nagusal kuningal Benjaminil on aeg abikaasa leida. Nahes ilusa printsessi Carolina portreed, on ta nii lummatud, et saadab oma portree vastu, kuid arahellitatud ja uhke printsess Carolina annab talle isekalt korvi. Kuningas Benjamin otsustab aga ta soosingu võita, kehastub aednikuks ja paaseb ta lossi toole.

programme.title: 1+1 on pere
programme.desc: Prantsusmaa / Suurbritannia 2016 komoodia Lavastaja:Hugo Gelin Osades: Omar Sy, Clemence Poesy, Antoine Bertrand Samuel elab kohustuste-ja vastutusvaba elu Lõuna-Prantsusmaa paikselisel merekaldal inimeste keskel, keda ta armastab ja kellega koos tootab, ilma et end vaga ara vasitaks.Ühel paeval aga jatab uks Samueli endisi voodikaaslasi tema katte paarikuuse beebi Gloria - tema tutre! Suutmata lapse eest hoolitseda, otsustab Samuel ta emale tagasi viia ja sõidab ruttu Londonisse lootusega ta ules leida, kuid tulutult.Kaheksa aastat hiljem, kui lahutamatuteks muutunud Samuel ja Gloria elavad Londonis, naaseb Gloria ema oma tutart tagasi nõudma...

programme.title: Kina ja Yuk
programme.desc: Elu Arktikas on raske ning Kina ja Yuki elu muutub veelgi raskemaks. Vapratest polaarrebastest saavad õige pea esmakordselt vanemad. Arktika talved on aga muutunud ja globaalne soojenemine tahendab kõigile ootamatusi. Yuk satub rannikul jahti pidades triivivale jaapangale ja uksi jaanud Kina ainus valik on asuda tundmatut territooriumi avastama, kui poegade sunnini on jaanud vaid loetud paevad. Kas Yuk ja Kina leiavad teineteist, enne kui nende pojad ilmavalgust naevad? Teel leiavad nad ootamatuid sõpru ja julmi vastaseid lummaval, kuid hapral maastikul. See seikluslugu raagib armastusest, lootusest, sõprusest ja tugevusest. Naete sel rannakul palju ullatusi ja loodusimesid.

programme.title: Maskeeritud spioonid
programme.desc: USA 2019 animakomoodia Lavastaja:Nick Bruno, Troy Quane Osades(haaled):Mart Avandi,Marten Manniste,Ülle Kaljuste,Elina Purde,Indrek Ojari, Tiit Sukk, Tarmo Mannard,Liisu Krass Superspioon Lance Sterling (Mart Avandi) ja noor teadlane Walter Beckett (Marten Manniste) on taielikud vastandid. Lance on lihvitud, elegantne ja ohtlik, Walter... ei ole. Aga selle, mis Walteril jaab puudu suhtlusoskuses ja kõiges muus, teeb Walter tasa nutikate leiutistega, mida Lance oma missioonidel kasutab. PÄrast seda, kui sundmused võtavad vagagi ootamatu poorde, peavad Lance ja Walter lootma teineteise peale taiesti uuel moel. Kui see kummaline paar ei suuda õppida koostood tegema, siis on ohus kogu maailm.

programme.title: Trollid
programme.desc: USA 2016 animakomoodia Lavastaja:Mike Mitchell, Walt Dohrn Osades (haaled):Rolf Roosalu,Saara Kadak,Hanna-Liina Võsa, Mart Avandi, Andero Ermel,Mart Toome, Garmen Tabor, Elina Purde, Andres Ots Trollid on ruhm vaikseid õnnelikke olendeid, kes elavad maailmas tais laulmist, kallistamist ja rõõmu. Ent nende metsaidull lõhutakse riismeteks, kui nad avastatakse Bergenite poolt. Nood on suured koletised, kes elavad pusivalt õnnetus maailmas, ent taipavad, et trolle suues saavad nad õnnelikeks. Trollide põgenemist juhib kuningas Peppy (Jeffery Tambor), kes juhatab nad labi salatunnelite. Kaks aastakummet hiljem organiseerib Peppy tutar Poppy (Anna Kendrick) nende põgenemise juubeli puhul uhked pidustused. Eraklik ellujaaja Branch (Justin Timberlake) hoiatab peo korraldamise eest, kuna ta muretseb, et larm meelitab kohale Bergenid. Selgub, et tal on õigus. Kuninglik kokk (Christine Baranski) nabib mitmed trollid kinni. Branch saadab Poppyt paastemissioonil, kuna kardab neiu turvalisuse parast. Nad saabuvad Bergeni linna, kus naevad, kuidas kuningas Gristle juunior (Christopher Mintz-Plasse) pistab nahka Creeki (Russell Brand). Poppy arvab aga, et Creek jai ellu. Nad avastavad paiga, kus trolle vangis hoitakse. Nende valvuriks on teenijatudruk Bridget (Zooey Deschanel), kes on kuningasse armunud. Ta nõustub vangid vabastama ning Poppy ja Branchi kuninga juurde juhatama, et nad saaks veenduda, kas Creek on veel elus, kui talle võimaldatakse kohting monarhiga. Seda kohtingut ette valmistades lahevad Poppy ja Branch tulli, kui Branch keeldub laulmast. Branch utleb Poppyle, et ta ei laula, kuna just laulmise tõttu pisteti nahka ta vanaema, misjarel ta kirevad varvid leinast halliks muutusid. Bridget maskeeritakse leedi Sadelevaks ning nad lahevad koos kuningas Gristleiga kohtingule rulluisuvaljakule ja restorani. Gristle palub Bridgeti endale saatjaks trollipooripaeva peole ning reedab, et Creek on elus ning teda hoitakse uhke juveeli sees. Trollid ei suuda enam aidata Bridgetit leedi Sadelevaks muuta ning too puhkeb nutma. Nad korraldavad paastemissiooni, ent kui Creek nad oma naha paastmiseks reedab, nabib kokk nad kinni. Vangistatult ja nahkapistmisele maaratult kaotab Poppy viimase lootuse ja trollid muutuvad halliks. Branch laulab Poppyle ning tunnistab ules, et armastab teda. Neiu ullatuseks taastab Branchi laul trollide endised varvid, ka ta enda omad. Bridget paastab nad vahetult enne soogilaulale sattumist. Poppy ei taha Bridgetit maha jatta, seega reedab ta koos teiste trollidega, et Bridget ongi leedi Sadelus. Kuningas Gristle ja teised Bergenid avastavad, et ei pea õnnelikkuse saavutamiseks trolle sooma, kui nood neile laulavad. Kuninglikule kokale see muutus ei meeldi ning ta uritab Poppy ja Branchi tappa. Ta peidab end lahedal asuvasse serveerimiskarusse, mis veereb Bergeni linnast valja. Creek on endiselt koka taskus. Trollid ja Bergenid elavad õnnelikult koos edasi ning Poppy kroonitakse trollide kuningannaks. Nad kallistavad Branchiga romantiliselt.

Piloot Millsi kosmoselaev satub parast katastroofilist õnnetust tundmatule planeedile, aga usna pea selgub, et tegu on hoopis Maaga… 65 miljonit aastat ajas tagasi. Millsil ja ainsal teisel ellujaajal Koal on paasemiseks vaid uks võimalus ning võitluses ellujaamise parast peavad nad labima tundmatu maastiku, mis on tulvil ohtlikest eelajaloolistest olenditest.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Suurbritannia, USA 2016 põnevusmarul Lavastaja:Paul Greengrass Osades:Matt Damon, Julia Styles, Alicia Vikander, Vincent Cassel, Tommy Lee Jones ja teised Endine CIA tootaja Nicky Parson (Julia Stiles) aitas kunagi Bournei (Matt Damon), haihtus seejarel ja tootab nuud keelekandja juures, kes kavatseb paljastada kõik CIA ulisalajased operatsioonid . Nicky hakib CIA andmebaasi ja laadib alla kogu info salajaste operatsioonide kohta, kaasa arvatud Treadstonei missiooni kohta, millest Bourne osa võttis. CIA agent Heather Lee (Alicia Vikander) avastab hakkimise ja teavitab sellest CIA juhti Robert Deweyt (Tommy Lee Jones), kes on ulisalajaste operatsioonide võtmeisik.

programme.title: Üledoos
programme.desc: Toulousei politsei narkoruhma juht Sara on sunnitud tegema koostood kohaliku kriminaalpolitsei juhi Richardiga, et peatada Hispaania ja Prantsusmaa vaheline metamfetamiinimuuk ning leida juhtumiga seotud mõrvar.

programme.title: Palgamõrvari naise ihukaitsja
programme.desc: USA, Inglismaa 2020 Komoodia, Marul, Krimi Lavastaja:Patrick Hughes Osades:Samuel L.Jackson, Ryan Reynolds, Salma Hayek, Morgan Freeman, Frank Grillo, Antonio Banderas Kõrgema klassi ihukaitsja Michael Bryce (R. Reynolds) saab lõpuks ometi hinge tõmmata. Taevas teab, kui kaua tal pole juba puhkust olnud. Kontimurdev ihukaitsjaamet hakkas talle kõvasti tervisele. Kõiges on suudi hullumeelne kuller Darius Kincaid (Samuel L. Jackson), kes on suure hulga inimesi teise ilma saatnud. Seal, kus tema valja ilmub, on tood alati jalaga segada.

programme.title: Eileen
programme.desc: Eileen tootab poistevanglas. Kui meeskonnaga liitub uus psuhholoog, tekib Eileenil temaga eriline kontakt. Kuid nende suhe võtab peagi kurja poorde.

programme.title: Mina, Tonya
programme.desc: R: Craig Gillespie. O: Margot Robbie, Sebastian Stan, Allison Janney. Nii parima naiskõrvalosataitja Oscari kui ka Kuldgloobuse palvinud ebatavaline eluloodraama 1990. aastate uhest parimast iluuisutajast Tonya Hardingust, kelle vastuoluline karjaar ja intsident tema peamise konkurendi Nancy Kerriganiga pani temast raakima kogu maailma. Tonya Harding (Margot Robbie) oli esimene ameeriklanna, kes sooritas jaal võimatuks peetud kolmekordse axeli ja tõestas, et ka naistel on võimalik teenida kõrgeim võimalik punktisumma - 6,0. Tema ekstravagantne riietumisstiil ja uisutamisnumbri rokkiv taustamuusika oli konkurentidega võrreldes midagi niivõrd teistsugust, et Harding muutus kiiresti publiku lemmikuks, samal ajal kui konservatiivsed kohtunikud olid kitsid talle kiitust jagama. Suur roll Tonya elus oli tema kalgil ja ropusuisel emal (Allison Janney), kes kull sisuliselt juhatas Tonya iluuisutamismaailma, kuid kellel kunagi ei jatkunud sudant ega tahet oma tutart tõeliselt toetada. Ka Tonya taiskasvanuelu polnud meelakkumine, kuid tanu oma vagivaldsele abikaasa Jeffile (Sebastian Stan), kes usutavalt seisis ka Nancy Kerrigani runnaku tellimise taga, sai temast tugev naine, kes teadis, mida tahendab olla vaene ja millist ranka tood tuleb teha tippu jõudmiseks. Tonya rollis naeme saravat Margot Robbiet ("Wall Streeti hunt"), keda peagi on võimalik kinolinal naha Inglismaa kuninganna Elizabeth I osas. Filmi peakangelanna erakordselt kalgi ema kujutamise eest parjati aga Allison Janney ("Juno") nii Oscari kui ka Kuldgloobuse auhinnaga. Filmi režissoor on austraallane Craig Gillespie ("Õuduste oo").

programme.title: Bridget Jonesi paevik
programme.desc: Suurbritannia/Prantsusmaa 2001 romantiline komoodia Lavastaja: Sharon Maguire Osades: Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth, Hugh Grant, Jim Broadbent 32-aastane Bridget (Renee Zellweger) otsustab uue aasta esimesel paeval, et on aeg alustada uut elu... ja kõik muudatused oma paevikusse kirja panna. Sellest paevast peale on kõige provokatiivsem, erootilisem ja husteerilisem raamat tema oolaual just seesama, mida ta ise kirjutab. Talle omase seikluslikkusega võtab Bridget elult kõik, mis võtta annab, olgu selleks siis magamine oma otsese ulemusega (Hugh Grant) või plaanid seoses pealtnaha taiesti sobimatu Mark Daryga (Colin Firth), ei loo see tudruk risti ette millegi ees. Hoiatus: Bridgeti elustiili jargmine võib olla ohtlik teie tervisele. Renee Zellweger kandideeris Bridgeti rolli eest parima naispeaosa Oscarile.

programme.title: Bridget Jones
programme.desc: Suurbritannia | Prantsusmaa | Saksamaa | Iirimaa | USA 2004 romantiline komoodia Lavastaja:Beeban Kidron Osades:Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth, Hugh Grant Kuigi Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) on maandunud õnnelikult enda armastatu Marki (Colin Firth) kate vahele, ei lase tema armukadedus nende suhtel rahulikult laabuda. Bridgetile teeb muret Marki uus kolleeg, kes lisaks heale valimusele suudab ka pea kõigega hakkama saada. Olukorra muudab veel eriti keeruliseks Bridgeti enda eks-kallima ning firmaboss Danieli (Hugh Grant) valja ilmumine.

programme.title: Bridget Jonesi beebi
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger naaseb, et jatkata teekonda labi armastuse, elu ja naeru. Bridget on rase, ent ei tea, kumb kahest mehest on isa. Teistes peaosades on Colin Firth ja Patrick Dempsey. Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) on saamas neljakumne kolme aastaseks ja ta ema Pamela (Gemmaa Jones) utleb talle, et kui ta plaanib lapsi saada, siis on selleks usna viimane aeg. Ta laheb lennuõnnetusel hukkunud sõbra matusele, kus kohtub oma endise kallima Mark Darcyga (Colin Firth), kes on seal koos oma abikaasa Camillaga (Agni Scott). Parast matusetseremooniat jatkab ta tood oma telesaatejuhist sõbra Miranda (Sarah Solemani) produtsendina. Miranda tahab tahistada Bridgeti hiljutist sunnipaeva, ent too keeldub, et tahistada seda koos teiste sõpradega. Ent ta avastab end huljatuna, kuna ta sõbrad on kõik oma lastega hõivatud. Pettununa võtab ta Miranda pakkumise vastu ning nad siirduvad koos muusikafestivalile. Üsna peatselt komistab Bridget naoli mudasse ning teda abistab nagus võõras mees. Festivali kaigus satub ta juhuslikult joobnult valesse telki, kust leiab ullatuseks sama mehe, kes teda abistas. Nad seksivad. Jargmisel hommikul Bridget põgeneb markamatult. Seejarel laheb ta ristsetele, kus on ise ristiemaks ja Mark on ristiisaks. Mark pihib talle, et nad lahutavad Camillaga oma abielu. Seejarel nad seksivad. Bridgetile meenub, et Mark pidas alati oma tood nende suhtest tahtsamaks, ning ta põgeneb hommikul enne mehe arkamist. Bridget markab, et ta on hakanud kaalus juurde võtma, ja ta sõber Shazzer (Sally Phillips) veenab teda rasedustesti tegema. Test osutub positiivseks. Telesaate tegemise kaigus markab ta meest, kellega kohtus festivalil, ning saab oma ullatuseks teada, et see on kohtinguapi loonud miljonar Jack Qwant (Patrick Dempsey). Saate filmimise pausi ausi ajal teatab Bridget Jackile oma rasedusest. Hoolimata algsest jahmatusest otsustab Jack teda toetada. Veidi hiljem teatab ta rasedusest ka Markile, kes satub isaks saamise mõttest elevusse. Bridget kutsub Jacki tooalasele uritusele ning on ehmunud, kui sinna ilmub ka Mark. Kaks meest saavad suureparaselt labi ning nad lahevad koos Bridgetiga õhtusoogile. Seal paljastatakse neile, et nad mõlemad võivad olla lapse isaks. Jack võtab selle uudise rahulikult vastu, ent Mark lahkub. Kuude moodudes lepib Mark lõpuks taas Bridgetiga ara. Tooalase eksimuse tõttu lahkub Bridget toolt, et vallandamist ennetada. Tootuna tunneb ta end nuud huljatult vihma katte jaetuna. Mark saabub ja utleb talle, et nad lahutasid naisega oma abielu. Nad on teineteist suudlemas, kui Bridgetil veed ara tulevad. Nad tõttavad haiglasse, ent neid takistavad liiklusummikud ja teetood. Mark uritab meeleheitlikult naist kanda, ent vajub kokku. Jack saabub just õigel hetkel ning neil õnnestub Bridget sunnitusmajja toimetada. Seal sunnitab ta poja. Mark ja Jack otsivad lepitust, kui dr Rawlings (Emma Thompson) palub neil DNA testi teha. Aasta hiljem abiellub Bridget oma poja Williami isa Mark Darcyga. Koos pulmatseremooniale siirdudes tundub Bridgetile, et ta elu on taiuslik.

programme.title: LaLiga
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: NCAA Mens Division I Basketball
programme.sub-title: Battle 4 Atlantis SF: Virginia Tech - Saint Marys
programme.desc: Action from an NCAA Championship event.

programme.title: Basketball
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketball
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: ONE Championship
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a mixed martial arts (MMA) organization that showcases world-class fighters from across the globe. With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: National League
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.title: National League
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.title: Tennis
programme.desc: Wimbledon is more than just a tennis tournament — its a summer tradition, a slice of British culture, and one of the most iconic sporting events in the world. Held every year in London, England, usually in late June to early July, its where the best tennis players on the planet come to battle it out on the famous grass courts of the All England Club. Its actually the oldest tennis tournament in the world, dating back to 1877, and its still the only Grand Slam played on grass — the fastest and most unpredictable surface. Thats part of what makes it so exciting. Matches are intense, fast-paced, and full of surprises. Wimbledon is packed with unique traditions that make it stand out. Players are required to wear all white on court — no exceptions. The crowd enjoys strawberries and cream, and you wont see flashy ads around the court — its all about the game. And of course, theres the Royal Box, where you might spot celebrities or even members of the British Royal Family watching the action. From rising stars to tennis legends, everyone dreams of lifting the famous Wimbledon trophy. Theres something magical about seeing players walk onto Centre Court, hearing the roar of the crowd, and witnessing moments that go down in sports history. Whether youre a tennis fan or just love great sports drama, Wimbledon is a must-watch — classy, thrilling, and full of unforgettable moments.

programme.title: Basketball
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: LaLiga
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: 1. Bundesliga
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.desc: A young couple leaves Mississippi for Santa Rosa Beach, Florida. She wants somewhere right on the water, and he prefers nearby hunting and fishing.

programme.title: How Close Can I Beach?
programme.desc: After living near Virginia Beach for years, a couple is ready to live on the beach. Should they downsize now that most of the kids are gone?

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: A New York couple look to buy a home in Long Island after winning $3 million on a scratch card. But, will they go for waterfront or more inland?

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: After winning $10 million, a man is retiring and moving to Hollywood, Florida. Can David Bromstad help him find the perfect property to relax and entertain in?

programme.title: Rannamajade otsinguil
programme.desc: A family of five visit Dauphin Island to hunt for a holiday retreat. They explore the areas panoramic views, historic sites and family activities.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: A young couple look for a home near their alma mater in Pennsylvania. Their wish list includes an all-white kitchen and a finished basement.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: A mother searches for a home in Agoura Hills, California. Her best friend suggests low maintenance properties, but she wants acreage for horses.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Tarek and Christina flip a house in Fullerton, CA, across the street from Tareks first flip. But, before renovating, they must deal with crumbling concrete.

programme.title: Elu saarel
programme.desc: A New Jersey Couple want to get back in touch with their roots by moving to Absecon Island. They want space for their children to stay and a beach!

programme.title: Elu saarel
programme.desc: Newlyweds follow their dreams of being waterside and return to his childhood home of San Juan Island. They are searching for a fixer-upper close to the shore.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: Jonathan and Drew take on two couples pooling their money for a shared California property. Plus, a single woman is ready to put down roots in Arizona.

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: A newly blended family calls on Izzy to remodel their water damaged home, and they need to meet a tight deadline to host their wedding reception.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Left with an inheritance, a woman and her BFF search with David to find a dream home near friends and family in Richmond, Texas.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Living most of the time in their RV, David helps a couple left with an inheritance find a home near the beach in Melbourne, Florida.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: After they win $1 million on a scratch card, David Bromstad helps a couple find their dream home in Rocky Mount, North Carolina.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: After they win a hefty $250,000 on a scratch card, David Bromstad helps a couple find their dream lake house in the Missouri Ozarks.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iraagis ja Suurias on meelega havitatud tuhandeid iidseid esemeid ja reliikviaid. Tiibeti kiltmaal ja Kesk-Aafrika džunglites on sustemaatiliselt havitatud puhakirju. Kas see kõik võib toimuda etteplaanitult?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick pingutab kõvasti, et saada katte uhe parima pesapalluriga seotud Major Leaguei suveniire. Corey ja Chum lahevad lõpuni, et tuvastada Boyz II Meni jope autentsust. Chum on lummatud mõnedest unikaalsetest esemetest Hollywoodi kuldsest ajastust.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kui meeskonnaliikmed kogevad pettumust valmistavat tagasilooki, on nad hammastunud, kui saavad teada, et see võis viia labimurdelise avastuseni.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Huljatud linnad. Aja poolt peaaegu kustutatud iidsed kultuurid. Jaljetult haihtunud hiiglaslikud impeeriumid. Kas moodne teadus suudab lahendada mõistatusi, mis neid "kadunud" tsivilisatsioone umbritsevad, või on siin mangus midagi mustilisemat?

programme.title: Pandikunnide Ameerika seiklus
programme.desc: As the Pawn Stars traveled around America, Rick, Corey, and Chum have taken a bite out of all this country has to offer. Now that theyre back in Vegas, Rick takes the guys on a culinary trip down memory lane.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Coreyl on magusaisu 1980. aastatest parit avamata karbitaie Star Wars kommide jarele. Kui NASA treeningsõiduki raketimootor poodi jõuab, puuab Rick iga hinna eest selle ebamaise eseme endale saada.

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Kui enamik inimesi otsib maavalist elu taevast, siis uks grupp uurijaid kaitub vastupidiselt - nad otsivad seda maa alt. Skinwalkeri rantšo Utah osariigis on kuulus paigana, kus on taheldatud sadu paranormaalseid ja UFO-dega seotud nahtusi.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Tony Harris eraldab kõige veenvamate viimasel ajal kogutud Bigfooti tõendite puhul ehtsad võltsingutest. Kas St. Helensi maelt leitud jalajaljed tõestavad, et Põhja-Ameerikas elab tohutu suur, avastamata primaat?

programme.title: Bermuda kolmnurk
programme.desc: Meeskond kasutab erivarustust, et otsida kahte suurt õhuvae lennukit, mis kadusid jaljetult ja mille pardal oli kumneid inimesi. Vaatamata ulatuslikele otsingutele ei leitud midagi.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Samal ajal, kui meeskond puuab peatada vee voolamist aiašahti, suvenevad Oak Islandi, kapten Phippsi ja templiruutlite vahelised seosed 5. platsil kiiresti.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Ameerika piirialad on tais legende kauboidest, indiaanlastest ja lindpriidest. Ent on ka palju õudseid lugusid neetud magedest, koletistest ja isegi UFOdest. Kas need jutud võivad olla tõsi? Kas Metsik Laas on palju veidram, kui tavaliselt arvatakse?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Puma Punkus Boliivias asuvad uhed maailma suurimad kiviplokid, mis on kõik raiutud uskumatu tapsusega. Kas uued tehnoloogilised edusammud võivad aidata lahendada sajandeid vana mõistatuse ja pakkuda tõendeid tulnukate sekkumisest Maal?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas uks piibli patriarh sai juhiseid 200 inglilt kõrgel maa kohal? Kas vanadele kreeklastele õpetas metalli tootlemist kalarahvas? Ja kas Egiptuse kõige vastuolulisem vaarao võis olla maavaline olend?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas uks kanuusõitja jaadvustas kaadrid legendaarsest suurjala-sarnasest Skunk Apeist, kes elab alligaatorite keskel? Kas NASA valetab meile marsisondide edu kohta ja esitab avalikkusele kaadreid, mis on filmitud Kanada metsikus looduses?

programme.title: Muistsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos uurib Peruu kõrbes olevate Nazca joonte mõistatust. Sajad hiiglaslikud jooned - loomade, geomeetriliste kujundite ja isegi tulnukalaadsete olendite kujulised - laiuvad miilide ulatuses ule kuiva tasandiku.

programme.desc: Milline on tõde vulkaanide laheduses korduvalt taheldatud UFO-de taga? Kes või mis valmistas Costa Rica kummalised kivikerad? Ja mis on uksinda džunglis elava tundmatu mehe saladus?

programme.title: Vanavarahundid
programme.desc: UUS! Mike ja Frank on kogujad, kes reisivad mooda riiki ja laheksid kõikjale, et antiiki leida. Assistent Daniellei abiga satuvad nad sageli naljakatesse olukordadesse.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler
programme.desc: The modern concept of "extreme sports" is a product of marketing, but back in the old days, the rules (or lack thereof) of our nations sports made them truly extreme.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Vennaskond jatkab pingutusi soos ja leiab kohe hammastavaid tõendeid sellest, et Oak Islandil liigutati sajandeid tagasi suurt lasti.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Maja, mis jaab napilt tornaado teelt kõrvale. Vihm, mis sajab verena taevast. Ja valk, mis jalitab teid teie koduni. Meie maailm on tais kummalisi ja mustilisi ilmastikufenomene, mida me siiani selgitada ei oska.

programme.title: Pandikunnid

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas need avastused - alates Andides peituvast kadunud linnast kuni salaparaste ebamaiste metallkeradeni ja uppunud linnani, mis vaidetavalt oli jumalate koduks - võivad olla tõendiks maavaliste kontaktide olemasolust?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas need salaparased paigad võivad kinnitada iidseid legende maa-alustest maailmadest, kus elavad maavalised olendid? Ja kui see on tõesti nii, siis millised muud maavalised saladused võivad meie jalge all peituda?

programme.title: Seletamatud paigad
programme.desc: Tuvastamata objektid, mida sõjavaelendurid on nainud... Maavalised sondid, mis lendavad labi meie paikesesusteemi... Kas hiljutised kummalised kohtumised ja nahtused viivad meid lahemale vastustele iidsetele kusimustele - kas oleme universumis uksi?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kas Chum laseb oma hambad kaiku, kui siseneb klient "Elavate surnute" naitlejate autogrammidega kujukeste kollektsiooniga? Corey tunneb end hasti, kui pandimajja ilmub Rock n Roll High Schooli plakat. Kas tehing on muusika tema kõrvadele?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas need salaparased paigad võivad kinnitada iidseid legende maa-alustest maailmadest, kus elavad maavalised olendid? Ja kui see on tõesti nii, siis millised muud maavalised saladused võivad meie jalge all peituda?

programme.title: Seletamatud paigad
programme.desc: Tuvastamata objektid, mida sõjavaelendurid on nainud... Maavalised sondid, mis lendavad labi meie paikesesusteemi... Kas hiljutised kummalised kohtumised ja nahtused viivad meid lahemale vastustele iidsetele kusimustele - kas oleme universumis uksi?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas need avastused - alates Andides peituvast kadunud linnast kuni salaparaste ebamaiste metallkeradeni ja uppunud linnani, mis vaidetavalt oli jumalate koduks - võivad olla tõendiks maavaliste kontaktide olemasolust?

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler
programme.desc: The modern concept of "extreme sports" is a product of marketing, but back in the old days, the rules (or lack thereof) of our nations sports made them truly extreme.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Vennaskond jatkab pingutusi soos ja leiab kohe hammastavaid tõendeid sellest, et Oak Islandil liigutati sajandeid tagasi suurt lasti.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Maja, mis jaab napilt tornaado teelt kõrvale. Vihm, mis sajab verena taevast. Ja valk, mis jalitab teid teie koduni. Meie maailm on tais kummalisi ja mustilisi ilmastikufenomene, mida me siiani selgitada ei oska.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad

programme.title: Bible Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Considered the most sacred place on Earth and fought over for thousands of years, was the area known as "The Promised Land" really given by God to a "chosen people?"

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: The team turn their attention to the Templars moment of reckoning: the fall of the order in 1307. Coded Templar symbols lead them to a mysterious monastery in Spain that may hold clues to the knights ultimate survival as a secret organisation.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: The Universe as we know it is condemned to death. Space, matter and even time will one day cease to exist and theres nothing we can do about it. Harsh realities are revealed about the future of our Universe.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost history. Among the missing: actual lunar rocks brought back from the moon by American astronauts during the Apollo space program - and later stolen from NASA headquarters in a daring heist.

programme.title: UFO failid
programme.desc: Join us for a detailed examination of the little-known phenomenon of USOs, or "Unidentified Submerged Objects", an advanced type of UFO that can operate just as efficiently in water as in the atmosphere.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Roomajate moodi tulnukad on parit ulmelistest H.P. Lovecrafti Valuusia ja "Star Treki" Cardassianide lugudest. Kas iidsed muudid roomajalikest elukatest naitavad, et need on midagi enamat kui lihtsalt popkultuuri looming?

programme.title: Kodusõja kulla needus
programme.desc: Aardekutid Rick ja Marty ajavad Kodusõja kulla jalgi, mis vaidetavalt konfiskeeriti 1865. aastal Jefferson Daviselt. Osa sellest lebab Michigani jarve põhjas, osa Michigani maapõue tunnelites ja ulejaanud uhes Utah koopas.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: In this episode we reconstruct the grand hypostyle hall at Karnak; explore the technical innovation and engineering skill that produced the temple at Abu Simbel and rebuild the Ramesseum as he would have seen it.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Seven years after the alleged end of the Templars, signs they were rising again appear in Portugal. The team investigate a plan to restart the Templars and explore possibilities that the "Templars 2.0" quietly consolidate power around the world.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: In this episode, our experts cook up ten ways you could destroy the earth, including swallowing it with a microscopic black hole, blowing it up with anti-matter, hurling it into the Sun, and switching off gravity.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Host Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost and stolen history, including an historic plaque commemorating Alex Haleys Roots. Plus: an original copy of the Bill of Rights, and a mysterious ring worn by Lee Harvey Oswald.

programme.title: UFO failid
programme.desc: While the Bermuda Triangle is a well-known area of strange phenomenon in the Atlantic, there is another, more treacherous triangle in the Pacific off the coast of Japan known as the "Dragons Triangle".

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Esimestest ajalooallikatest alates on raagitud olevustest, kes on erakordselt tugevad, liiguvad ulehelikiirusel ja kellel on muud ebainimlikud võimed. Kas need võivad olla lood maavalistest tegelastest, kes elasid kunagi Maa peal?

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Vieira brothers discover new signs of the Goshen Mystery Tunnel with a team of archaeologists.

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: Pooleldi pull, pooleldi inimene - looduse sunnitatud friigina on Minotaurus uks mutoloogia hirmsamaid koletisi. Veider lugu elajalikkusest, inimohvrist ja sõjast - Minotauruse muut elab edasi, sumboliseerides kõigi meeste sees peituvat koletist.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Japan, 1612: Legendary samurai Musashi meets arch rival Kojiro in a climactic duel. Modern-day warrior SFC Terry Schappert goes inside some of the most famous warrior cultures of all time to explore their weaponry, tactics and psyche.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Mis siis saab, kui Neptuuni-suurune rõngastega planeet võtab suuna Maa poole? See lõpeb nelja tunni jooksul taieliku havinguga.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans
programme.desc: 15,000 years ago man and the wolf form a partnership that shapes the future of Mankind. With the help of mans new best friend we domesticate more animals, sowing the first seeds of farming and civilisation.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans
programme.desc: The ability to share complicated ideas allowed early man to hunt, farm and build communities. And the creation of things like an alphabet and the printing press allow Mankind to further expand, leading to the proliferation of ideas and revolution.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Brad and the team hunt for the missing White House cornerstone, as well as a lost gun that could prove key to solving the infamous Amityville murders.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: The team digs into one of the Civil Wars most enduring legends: that millions of dollars worth of missing gold and silver from the Confederate treasury still lies buried in secret hiding places across America.

programme.title: Kodusõja kulla needus
programme.desc: Uus teooria vihjab sellele, et varastatud konfoderatsiooni kulla eest, mille vaartuseks oli 140 miljonit dollarit, rahastati uhte Ameerika Ühendriikide ajaloo saatanlikumat kuritegu.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos, an expert on H2s Ancient Aliens, is continually asked to visit sites and speak about the topics covered in the series. This show explores the possibility of a spin-off series, with Giorgio himself as the featured talent.

programme.title: Countdown to Apocalypse
programme.desc: Native American tribe the Hopi have been making prophecies for centuries. They believe that our actions have caused the planet to become out of balance, and will trigger a cataclysmic purification that few will survive.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: New technologies have suddenly revealed thousands of distant planets, opening up the most exciting period in astronomy in decades. Some believe were on the verge of answering the ancient question: are we alone in the universe?

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: The new series of River Hunters kicks off with an investigation into the last battle to have taken place on British soil, the battle of Culloden in 1746, on the outskirts of Britains most northerly city and capital of the Highlands, Inverness.

programme.title: Robbie Williams - Live at the Apple Music Festival
programme.desc: A brand new show that brings a veteran artist at his best! The talented artist, who became famous in the group ""Take That"", lacks presentations, but he himself begins his show by saying: ""Let me resubmit ..."". Robbie Williams has the ability to reinvent himself, exhibiting so much energy that he seems to be a rookie artist. Already in the 40s band of pop music, Robbie is more than an artist consecrated worldwide, is a reference with hits present in the best lists of consecrated DJs. This show at the Roundhouse coincided with the announcement of their 11th solo album, Heavy Entertainment Show, just released. The new albums title reflects Williams performance as energy-dense as his 11-member big band, including his hits partner Guy Chambers on the piano. A formidable 90 minute pop odyssey. Mixing tracks from his Take That era, old or new, his songs allow him to reclaim his throne from an artist who dominates the stage - in fact, there is no one in pop music who combines his monumental energy with music Touching. A magical moment can be perceived in ""A Better Man"", only with the guitar on stage; Proof that he is an artist that goes beyond the scenery. This Blu-Ray shows the trajectory of an artist who knows how to renew himself every lap; An example for the new generations of music that are lost in appearance, forgetting the essential aspect that Robbie Williams is revealing more and more.

programme.title: Muse - Live at Festival Rock Am Ring
programme.desc: Rock Am Ring (Nurburgring), Rock Im Park (Nuremberg) is a music festival that takes place annually at the Nurburgring Race Track in western Germany. Featuring Muse.

programme.title: Iggy Pop - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Duran Duran
programme.sub-title: Duran Duran: A Diamond In the Mind
programme.desc: A Diamond In The Mind Live was filmed at the MEN Arena in Manchester on December 16th 2011. This stunning Duran Duran live show is the perfect combination of great music, amazing visuals and iconic style which has been the bands trademark throughout their career. Following the release of their acclaimed "All You Need Is Now" album, this concert combines new songs from that release with their classic hits. Whether in the studio or the live arena, Duran Duran are masters of their craft and this latest concert bursts with energy and oozes class in the way that only they can.

programme.title: George Michael Londonis

programme.title: Paul McCartney - A MusiCaresTribute
programme.desc: On February 10, 2012, Sir Paul McCartney was honored as the 2012 MusiCares® Person of the Year. At a gala event in Los Angeles, Paul and a cast of superstar guests performed some of the quintessential songs from his renowned and celebrated career. Proceeds from the sale of this product will provide essential support for MusiCares, which ensures that music people have a place to turn in times of financial, medical and personal need.

programme.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd - Live From the Florida Theater
programme.desc: Earlier this year Lynyrd Skynyrd performed their first two studio albums, "Pronounced Lĕh-nerd Skin-nerd" and "Second Helping", live in their entirety for the first time, at two specially staged concerts at the Florida Theatre in their home town of Jacksonville, Florida. It was a special occasion for both the act and their fans as the band performed tracks theyd never or rarely played live before alongside classic songs that are an essential part of any Lynyrd Skynyrd live show. These unique concerts are a must have for any Lynyrd Skynyrd fan.

programme.title: Snow Patrol - Live At Somerset House
programme.desc: With their third album, Final Straw, selling a cool 1.5 million in the UK in its year of release, Snow Patrols reputation as a remarkable band remains intact. "Live At Somerset House" reveals why the band is praised for delivering fantastic live performances. It also places them at one of Londons most gorgeous settings which complements the bands distinctive and provocative sound perfectly. Performing live for the first time with a string section, this amazing Snow Patrol concert, features all the key hits including Run, Spitting Games, "Chocolate" and a blistering version of Tiny Little Fractures.

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: "Hank" Williams is regarded as one of the most significant and influential American singers and songwriters of the 20th century. Williams recorded 35 singles (five released posthumously) that reached the Top 10 of the Billboard Country and Western Best Sellers chart, including 11 that ranked number one (three posthumously). After an initial rejection, Williams joined the Grand Ole Opry. writing hits "Your Cheatin Heart", Hey, Good Lookin", and So Lonesome I Could Cry". In 1952, he was dismissed by the Grand Ole Opry because of his unreliability and alcohol abuse. On January 1, 1953, he suffered heart failure while traveling to perform at a concert in West Virginia and died as a result. Despite his short life, Williams is one of the most celebrated and influential musicians of the 20th and has been cited as a key musical influence on Elvis Presley, Bob Dylan and The Rolling Stones.

programme.title: Duran Duran
programme.sub-title: Duran Duran: A Diamond In the Mind
programme.desc: A Diamond In The Mind Live was filmed at the MEN Arena in Manchester on December 16th 2011. This stunning Duran Duran live show is the perfect combination of great music, amazing visuals and iconic style which has been the bands trademark throughout their career. Following the release of their acclaimed "All You Need Is Now" album, this concert combines new songs from that release with their classic hits. Whether in the studio or the live arena, Duran Duran are masters of their craft and this latest concert bursts with energy and oozes class in the way that only they can.

programme.title: Robbie Williams - Live at the Apple Music Festival
programme.desc: A brand new show that brings a veteran artist at his best! The talented artist, who became famous in the group ""Take That"", lacks presentations, but he himself begins his show by saying: ""Let me resubmit ..."". Robbie Williams has the ability to reinvent himself, exhibiting so much energy that he seems to be a rookie artist. Already in the 40s band of pop music, Robbie is more than an artist consecrated worldwide, is a reference with hits present in the best lists of consecrated DJs. This show at the Roundhouse coincided with the announcement of their 11th solo album, Heavy Entertainment Show, just released. The new albums title reflects Williams performance as energy-dense as his 11-member big band, including his hits partner Guy Chambers on the piano. A formidable 90 minute pop odyssey. Mixing tracks from his Take That era, old or new, his songs allow him to reclaim his throne from an artist who dominates the stage - in fact, there is no one in pop music who combines his monumental energy with music Touching. A magical moment can be perceived in ""A Better Man"", only with the guitar on stage; Proof that he is an artist that goes beyond the scenery. This Blu-Ray shows the trajectory of an artist who knows how to renew himself every lap; An example for the new generations of music that are lost in appearance, forgetting the essential aspect that Robbie Williams is revealing more and more.

programme.title: Duran Duran - Live at Wembley
programme.sub-title: Duran Duran - The Reunion Tour: Live at Wembley
programme.desc: Filmed at Wembley Arena, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Duran Duran featuring unforgettable version of their hits: "Rio", "Hungry Like The Wolf", "The Reflex" and many more…

programme.title: Pet Shop Boys - Live at Roskilde
programme.desc: Filmed in Roskilde, Denmark, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Pet Shop Boys featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Always On My Wind, West End Girls, "Being Boring" and many more...

programme.title: Diana Krall - Live in Paris
programme.desc: Filmed live at the Paris Olympia to a sell out audience, this concert features the captivating voice of Diana Krall who delivers a sensual collection of romantic ballads and bossa novas. Diana is accompanied by the Orchestre Symphonique Europeen and Paris Jazz Big Band, as well as her own recording jazz band flown in especially from LA. In addition to this, she also welcomes legendary conductor Claus Ogerman. This live performance features tracks from her latest album "The Look of Love" and the full set from her sensational world tour.

programme.title: ZZ Top
programme.desc: "Live In Germany" was filmed at the Grugahalle in Essen, Germany for the Rockpalast TV series. Hot on the heels of their classic "Deguello" album (it features 9 of the 10 songs from it) the show finds ZZ Top before sequencers and synthesizers epitomising their "lil ol blues band from Texas" nickname. Complimented by tracks drawn predominantly from their "Tres Hombres" and "Fandango!" albums this is a true best of ZZ Top in the seventies.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Peter Gabriel - New Blood
programme.sub-title: Peter Gabriel - New Blood: Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at the Hammersmith Apollo in March 2011, ""New Blood - Live In London"" captures Peter Gabriel performing live with the 46 piece New Blood Orchestra. The repertoire mixes cover versions from his ""Scratch My Back"" album with classic tracks from across his solo career in brand new orchestral arrangements. Gabriel is a renowned live performer and his onstage charisma and instantly recognisable voice combine brilliantly with the orchestral sound palette to breathe a new sense of wonder into familiar songs. As you would expect the concert is also a visual feast, with graphics, animation and imagery blending to enhance and illustrate the music. This is truly a live experience not to be missed.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: An English rock band formed at Charterhouse School, Godalming, Surrey in 1967. The band underwent many changes in musical style over its career, from folk music to progressive rock in the 1970s, before moving towards pop at the end of the decade. They have sold 21.5 million RIAA-certified albums in the US and their worldwide sales are estimated to be between 100 million and 150 million. Featuring archive material, music videos and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists Michael Bonner (Uncut Magazine), Hamish MacBain (Shortlist), John Aizlewood (Evening Standard)

programme.title: Rod Stewart - Live at Hyde Park
programme.desc: On a sunny day in September 2015, Rod Stewart took to the stage in Londons Hyde Park to bring to a close BBC Radio 2s annual Festival in a Day. In front of 50,000 people, Rod delivered not his usual stadium set but a bespoke selection of hits from his back catalogue spanning his career, including Gasoline Alley, Angel, In a Broken Dream and The Killing of Georgie (Part 1 and 2), plus Faces classics such as Ooh La La and the blues standard Rollin and Tumblin, a number that Rod used to perform with Long John Baldry back in the day. To close the set, Rod brought on his old pal guitarist Jim Cregan to help him perform his 1978 hit I Was Only Joking. All in all, a memorable and unique concert that is unlikely to be repeated anytime soon.

programme.title: John Lee Hooker - Live At Montreux 1990
programme.desc: The legendary bluesman John Lee Hooker brought his boogie style blend of rhythm and blues to deliver two blistering performances at the Montreux Jazz Festival in 1983 and 1990. Returning to the prestigious festival in 1990 with The Coast To Coast Blues Band the tracklist features hits such as Boom Boom", "The Healer" and his no.1 Jukebox hit "Boogie Chillen".

programme.title: Shakira - Oral Fixation Tour
programme.desc: Oral Fixation Tour was the fourth concert tour by Colombian singer and songwriter, Shakira. It was launched in support of her sixth and seventh studio albums Fijacion Oral, Vol. 1 (2005). and Oral Fixation, Vol. 2 (2005).

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Neil Tennant and Chris Lowe met in a record store in West London. Although they came from different backgrounds they bonded over a love of electronic music. "Hague" their debut album "Please" was released in 1986, it entered the top 10 around the world. In 2013 the band released "Electric", which after the mellow Elysium saw them return to their dance roots, 30 years into their career the Pet Shop Boys remain top of the charts. Featuring archive material, music videos "Vocal", "Love etc".and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists Michael Bonner (Uncut Magazine), Hamish MacBain (Shortlist), John Aizlewood (Evening Standard)

programme.title: Annie Lennox - An Evening of Nostalgia
programme.desc: An Evening Of Nostalgia with Annie Lennox captures one of musics most popular and acclaimed artists in her only full concert performance of songs from her Grammy-nominated Nostalgia album. Fronting a 19-piece band - including string and horn sections - and unveiling striking lighting and production elements created especially for this concert, Lennox demonstrates her distinctive vocal and performance talents on an array of songsfrom the classic American songbook, ranging from "Summertime," "Georgia On My Mind", "Strange Fruit" and "God Bless The Child" to one of rocknrolls most enduring classics, "I Put A Spell On You." As she does on her Nostalgia album that spawned this one-of-a-kind concert, the singular approach Lennox brings to these classics enables them to resonate for a 21st Century audience. The artist concludes her extraordinary show with a four-song selection of her own hits performed solo at the piano, including "Here Comes The Rain Again," "No More I Love Yous," "Why" and "Sweet Dreams." Beautifully filmed by director Natalie Johns at the downtown Los Angeles art-deco landmark Orpheum Theatre on January 28, 2015, An Evening Of Nostalgia with Annie Lennox is a truly unique concert performance that music fans the world over can now experience for themselves.
