programme.title: 180 kraadi | Teletsuklid
programme.desc: Гости программы рассказывают истории из своих жизней и о том, как их жизнь перевернулась на 180 градусов.

programme.title: Klubi 700
programme.desc: Saatesari, mis kajastab kristliku maailma uudiseid ja põnevaid ning julgustavaid lugusid inimeste eludest ule terve maailma.

programme.title: Tee Jumala riiki. Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: Путь в Царство Божье. Пастор Джентезен Франклин. Его послания, пробуждают и созидают.

programme.title: Israeli reisijuht | Teekond labi ajaloo | Drive Through History
programme.desc: Познавательная, экскурсионно-туристическая телепрограмма об истории и достопримечательностях Израиля.

programme.title: Loomine 21. sajandil
programme.desc: За время, прошедшее со дня опубликования книги Дарвина "Происхождения видов", теория эволюции глубоко укоренилась в сознании людей. Повествования о сотворении всего Всемогущим Творцом кажется людям совершенно несовместимым с современными научными открытиями. Нам со школьной скамьи навязывают мысль о теории эволюции как "завершенную картину" - случай, время и законы природы позаботились о том, чтобы за миллионы лет постепенно развились сегодняшние формы жизни. В действительности же растущее число естественнонаучных открытий указывает на то, что эволюционная теория была слишком поспешно принята за факт.

programme.title: 180 kraadi | Teletsuklid
programme.desc: Гости программы рассказывают истории из своих жизней и о том, как их жизнь перевернулась на 180 градусов.

programme.title: Carla Bley Sextet - Lugano Jazz Estival
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. Discover the special bond between pianist Carla Bley and bassist Steve Swallow. The two have performed in the same bands since the 60s and have been romantic partners for more than two decades. Watching them perform is the definition of musical telepathy. Together with musicians Wayne Krantz, Victor Lewis, Larry Willis, and Don Alias, they form an amazing sextet at Estival in 1986.

This world creation features Shirine, Princess of Armenia, a woman of great modernity and a figure of emancipation. An ardent call for freedom. programme.title: Electronic Vibrations - A sound changes the world
programme.desc: Electronic Vibrations - A sound changes the world Whether techno or hip-hop - electronic music is nowadays the driving force of pop culture. We have almost forgotten that its origins lie in the WDRs electronic studio, which made Cologne to one of the centres of the avant-garde during the post-war years. This is the story of how a room full of strange devices would become a cabinet of curiosities, the vibrations of which sent the whole world in a state of ecstasy. From the beginnings directly after the Second World War in Paris with Pierre Schaeffers musique concrète, the film focuses on Stockhausen and goes on to Kraftwerk, from Jean-Michel Jarre and the IRCAM studio right up to Detroit to the beginnings of techno. Directed by Thomas von Steinaecker

programme.title: The Sound Weavers
programme.sub-title: The Sound Weavers: Ludovico Einaudi, Hauschka, Joep Beving, Hania Rani
programme.desc: The Sound Weavers: Ludovico Einaudi, Hauschka, Joep Beving, Hania Rani Sold-out concerts, millions of albums sold to make the classical music industry green with envy: neoclassical, as the new musical trend is called, is a mega hit. What makes the form so popular? Is this music skillful or just comforting? Are its composers Mozart 2.0 or rather maestros for the masses? Do they build a bridge to the musical past, allowing our ears to roam comfortably in familiar territory? The documentary traces the journey of some of the protagonists of the genre by telling their stories, and seeking answers from sociologists, neuroscientists, musicologists and even marketing experts. But above all, it allows these creators - these weavers - to have their say. Directed by Anne-Kathrin Peitz 2021

programme.title: McCoy Tyner Trio live at Estival Lugano
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. McCoy Tyners first main exposure came with Benny Golson, being the first pianist in Golsons and Art Farmers Jazztet. Hes also known for his work with the John Coltrane Quartet. Tyners style is easily comparable to Coltranes maximalist style of saxophone. Though a member of Coltranes group, he was never overshadowed by the saxophonist, but complemented and even inspired Coltranes open-minded approach. McCoy Tyner is considered one of the most influential jazz pianists of the 20th century, an honour he earned both with Coltrane and in his years of performing following Coltranes death.

programme.title: Andre Midani
programme.sub-title: Andre Midani: An Insiders Story of Brazilian Music
programme.desc: Andre Midani: An Insiders Story of Brazilian Music Based on his autobiography, this unique session of intimate conversations reveals the key events in the history of Brazilian music through the eyes of Andre Midani, who helped shape the Brazilian music scene like no other from the 1950s to the new millennium. With Gilberto Gil, Caetano Veloso, Marisa Monte, Chico Buarque, Frejat, Jorge Ben Jor, Erasmo Carlos, Boni, Fernanda Torres, Washington Olivetto, Carlos Lyra, Miúcha, Roberto Menescal, Baby Brazil, Dadi, Liminha, Nelson Motta, Carlos Diegues, Fernanda Montenegro - and many others Directed by Andrucha Waddington, Mini Kerti 2015

programme.title: Die groSSen Musikrivalen
programme.desc: Rivalry in Music - Callas vs. Tebaldi Maria Callas and Renata Tebaldi were the two most famous sopranos of the second half of the last century. Turned into hostile enemies by their admirers, the two became untouchable goddesses of opera. For their fans, Callas was known as "the tigress", Tebaldi as "the voice of an angel": the two singers could hardly have been more different, whether in their professional or private lives. To this day, Callas remains perhaps the greatest soprano of all time. Her rival, Tebaldi, is best known to opera lovers. Why is the posthumous fame of the two prima donnas so different? Directed by Andreas Morell 2020

"Opera bouffe" in a prologue and two acts by Francis Poulenc (1899 - 1963) Libretto by Francis Poulenc after Guillaume Apollinaires play Firt performance in Paris, Opera-Comique (Salle Favart), 3 June 1947 Les Siècles, François-Xavier Roth (conductor) Ensemble Aedes Olivier Py (stage direction) Pierre-Andre Weitz (sets, costumes), Bertrand Killy (lighting) Le Rossignol Sabine Devieilhe (Le Rossignol) Cyrille Dubois (Le Pecheur / 1er emissaire japonais) Chantal Santon Jeffery (La Cuisinière) Laurent Naouri (Le Chambellan) Victor Sicard (Le Bonze) Rodolphe Briand (3e emissaire japonais) Francesco Salvadori (Un emissaire japonais) Jean-Sebastien Bou (LEmpereur de Chine) Lucile Richardot (La Mort) Les Mamelles de Tiresias Sabine Devieilhe (Therèse-Tiresias / La Cartomancienne) Laurent Naouri (Le Directeur de theâtre) Jean-Sebastien Bou (Le mari de Therèse) Victor Sicard (Le Gendarme) Cyrille Dubois (Le Journaliste parisien / Monsieur Lacouf) Rodolphe Briand (Le Fils / Une grosse dame) Chantal Santon Jeffery (Une dame elegante) Lucile Richardot (La Marchande de journaux) Francesco Salvadori (Monsieur Presto) Paris, Theâtre des Champs-Elysees, 19 mars 2023

programme.desc: Mata Hari Choreography by Ted Brandsen Libretto by Janine Brogt Music by Tarik ORegan Dutch Ballet Orchestra Matthew Rowe, conductor Sets, Lights, Clement and Sanôu Costume, François-Noël Cherpin With Mata Hari / Margaretha - Anna Tsygankova Rudolph McLeod - Casey Herd General Kiepert - Jozef Varga Vadime de Masloff - Artur Shesterikov Shiva - Young Gyu Choi Temple Dancer- Wen Ting Guan Frieda McLeod - Emanouela Merdjanova Isadora Duncan - Erica Horwood La Madame- Nadia Yanowsky MC - Edo Wijnen M. Guimet - Anatole Babenko Lieutenant Ladoux - Roman Artyushkin Aunts- Wendeline Wijkstra, Pascalle Paerel et Hannah de Klein Uncles - Wolfgang Tietze, Peter Leung et Matthew Pawlicki-Sinclair Adam Zelle (Margarethas father) - Nicolas Rapaic And the Dutch National Ballet Live from Dutch National Opera, Amsterdam TV Director, Jeff Tudor

programme.title: La grande danza - Aterballetto in Milan
programme.desc: La grande danza - Aterballetto in Milan Choreographies by Jiří Pokorny (Words and Space), Giuseppe Spota (Narcissus), Philippe Kratz (Phoenix) Aterballetto is the principal producing and touring dance company in Italy. They are well-known for their ability to shift their style across a wide range of musical genres, from classical to pop and jazz. Jiří Pokornys "Words and Space" is a metaphor of an intrapersonal speech, a book full of floating stories. It is personal, intimate, and very poetic. "Phoenix" is inspired by the idea of the infinite circular motion of life: Birth, growth, immobility, death and finally birth once again. Choreographer Philippe Kratz tries to understand who we were and what we are capable to become. In "Narcissus" Giuseppe Spota takes a look at the youth of today. Are they ready to come out of their virtual frames and face the mirror ofeveryday life? Or will they all end up like Narcissus,alone to admire and cherish themselves? Directed by Andreas Morell

programme.title: Monteverdi from Mantua to Venice - John Eliot Gardiner
programme.desc: Monteverdi, Caravaggio and his contemporaries - Rome, Mantua, Venice John Eliot Gardiner - Monteverdi Choir, English Baroque Soloists An exceptional musical journey by John Eliot Gardiner and the Monteverdi Choir in Italy to present Monteverdis music in the artistic context of its time: Caravaggio, Bernini, Titian at the Galleria Borghese and the Palazzo Barberini in Rome, at the Palazzo Ducale in Mantua and in Venice, particularly the Basilica dei Frari, where the composers tomb is located. Directed by Sebastien Glas

programme.title: Help! Im in a Secret Relationship!
programme.desc: What started as an online romance for Rolando and Joshua blossomed into a two-and-a-half-year relationship thats still going strong. Wasting no time, the couple purchased a home together and began mapping out their future. But while everything seems perfect on the surface, trouble is brewing underneath. Joshuas past is a mystery to Rolando, he hasnt met any of his family or friends from California where he grew up and is nowhere to be found on Joshuas social media. All the while, Rolando has let Joshua into his life with open arms. After over two years of dating, Rolando said enough is enough and wants to get to the bottom of why hes being hidden.

programme.title: Extraordinary Australia
programme.desc: Australias coastline is a true natural wonder, encompassing a diverse range of bountiful habitats.

programme.title: Day of the Dragon
programme.desc: The clock starts just before sunrise - when the temperature begins to rise. Its hard work being the worlds biggest lizard on Rinca island. Competition is so fierce he cant afford to slow down. For the biggest male on the island, an ever- warming environment and shrinking hunting grounds threaten his survival across every hour of the day.

programme.title: Extraordinary Australia
programme.desc: From lush ancient rainforests to wet grassland and dry eucalyptus forest, Australias diverse habitats are home to an array of weird and wonderful creatures found nowhere else on the planet. From the bizarre anatomy of the platypus to the savage screams of Tasmanian devils, the creatures of Australia rely on extraordinary adaptations to survive in continents vast and diverse habitats.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: By changing their colour hundreds of times, or transforming their own bodies, octopuses are the most extraordinary shape-shifters on the planet.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Masterminds. Deeply curious, strategic, and super smart - the octopus is one of natures ultimate problem solvers.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Social Networkers. The octopus was thought to be natures ultimate loner - now its secret social life is revealed.

programme.title: Sky Safari
programme.desc: Take an aerial odyssey across Australia, a dramatic continent full of strange and unique creatures and places. Experience powerful natural forces as we soar over Australias iconic landmarks of Uluru, the Great Barrier Reef, and Lake Eyre. In each location we descend to reveal how topography, climate and geographic isolation continue to challenge and shape the creatures that live here, and how those creatures interact with each other.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: By changing their colour hundreds of times, or transforming their own bodies, octopuses are the most extraordinary shape-shifters on the planet.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Masterminds. Deeply curious, strategic, and super smart - the octopus is one of natures ultimate problem solvers.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin journeys down Australias rivers to find which riparian animal is most built to survive. His first encounter is with the duck-billed platypus, a peculiar and adorable monotreme, or egg-laying mammal. Phil then gets a grip on the ultra-slimy long-finned eel and learns of its extraordinary reproductive habits before finally catching a river-dwelling bull shark.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin wanders into Australias woodlands to find the species most adapted for survival. Phil first encounters the yellow-bellied glider, an intrepid marsupial with a built-in wingsuit. Next is one of Australias most abundant but deadly reptiles, the eastern brown snake. Last but certainly not least, Phil finds the iconic, cuddly and oh-so-sleepy koala.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: Zoologist Jack Randall journeys into Australias remote Northern Territory to encounter six dangerous pythons, including the rare Oenpelli. Along the way, Jack dives into crocodile-infested swamps, reaches into giant lizard burrows, dodges the bite of a deadly venomous snake and crawls into cramped, dark caves to find these elusive predators.

programme.title: Loomad ilma reegliteta
programme.desc: When fight or flight instincts kick in, animals will do anything to survive. From heroic acts of bravery to narrow escapes and near misses, expect the unexpected when creatures encounter the animal kingdoms strangest curve balls.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.sub-title: The Most Venomous Snakes in the World
programme.desc: Zoologist Jack Randall explores Australias remote Cape York peninsula to confront five of the most venomous snakes in the world, including the elusive Coastal Taipan. Along the way, Jack encounters huge pythons and terrifying tarantulas and joins forces with a local wildlife legend to determine which is the deadliest snake "down under."

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: Zoologist Jack Randall journeys into Australias remote Northern Territory to encounter six dangerous pythons, including the rare Oenpelli. Along the way, Jack dives into crocodile-infested swamps, reaches into giant lizard burrows, dodges the bite of a deadly venomous snake and crawls into cramped, dark caves to find these elusive predators.

programme.title: Loomad ilma reegliteta
programme.desc: A selection of profoundly unpredictable incidents, from a trespassing bear and a quick-witted sea lion to a slippery serpent surprise.

programme.title: Loomad ilma reegliteta
programme.desc: Whether its out-of-bounds behaviour or savage instincts run amok, when animals act out theyre a force to be reckoned with

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.sub-title: The Most Venomous Snakes in the World
programme.desc: Zoologist Jack Randall explores Australias remote Cape York peninsula to confront five of the most venomous snakes in the world, including the elusive Coastal Taipan. Along the way, Jack encounters huge pythons and terrifying tarantulas and joins forces with a local wildlife legend to determine which is the deadliest snake "down under."

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: Fearless wildlife zoologist Jack Randall dives head first into a marine mystery: are majestic green sea turtles adapting to the devastating conditions of Australias dying Great Barrier Reef? While joining forces with a dedicated team of daring scientists, Jack dodges bull rays, snatches nurse sharks and wrangles dugongs.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: Wildlife zoologist Jack Randall journeys deep into the Australian outback to fulfill his lifelong dream of being accepted into a "mob" of wild kangaroos. Along the way, Jack snatches up snakes, lunges after lizards, defends against dangerous dingoes and even rescues an orphaned baby kangaroo.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: Jack Randall travels into Australias untamed Northern Territory to the front lines of a battle between two different species of deadly crocodiles - the massive saltwater crocs are rapidly overrunning their smaller freshwater cousins.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: Zoologist Jack Randall journeys into Australias remote Northern Territory to encounter six dangerous pythons, including the rare Oenpelli. Along the way, Jack dives into crocodile-infested swamps, reaches into giant lizard burrows, dodges the bite of a deadly venomous snake and crawls into cramped, dark caves to find these elusive predators.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol races against the clock to save the life of a mother cow. A whirlwind of emergencies keeps Doc out on nonstop farm calls while his team of vets keep the clinic covered. Dr. Nicole is called to check on a beloved reindeer. Dr. Lisa removes a suspicious growth from a sheep dog and Dr. Brenda treats a puppy that is losing weight.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: From the dark of morning to the black of night, the vets are moooving. Dr. Pol wrestles to save a calf and mamma cow in a troubled labor. Dr. Nicole sutures her way through two ducks wounded from an attack, and a dog with a torn ear. Dr. Lisa investigates a rare paw problem, while a chihuahuas chest x-ray exposes a hidden issue. Every day is indeed... all its quacked up to be.

programme.title: Jaakarude kuningriik
programme.desc: As the Arctic changes faster than ever, a team of polar bear guides prepares for an epic journey; a first-ever attempt to follow the bears on the sea ice of Hudson Bay. In this high-stakes high-reward venture, they will document the secret world of bears, a mysterious and disappearing realm that is the bears key to survival. Life on the ice is a critical time for these bears. It also remains undocumented, deemed too dangerous for humans to follow, hinted at only through aerial reconnaissance and satellite collar research. The team, armed with traditional ecological knowledge and the latest 4K camera technology, will witness never- before-seen seal hunting strategies and document rapid adaptations to climate change, including whale predation and open-water hunting.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: National Geographic Television joins a rare scientific odyssey to explore the Canyons entire 277-mile length and examine its mysteries.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: Papahanaumokuakea Marine National Monument, encompasses the Northwestern Hawaiian Islands. A month long scientific expedition will journey to these remote waters to map the uncharted.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Few of Europes countries boast the wide and wondrous variety of animals found in Greece. Its mainland is dubbed the Serengeti of Europe, while the coast is home to Europes largest marine reserve. Greece is a land brimming with natural treasures. Hidden hunters feast on migrating birds, a scorpion searches for his soulmate, and young seal pups venture out into the unknown.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins
programme.desc: The emperors are the largest and strongest of all penguins, living in the coldest, most extreme place on Earth. National Geographic Explorer Bertie Gregory embeds with an Antarctic colony and encounters social skills never filmed before. As the planet rapidly warms, he discovers bonds forged from birth between family, friends and strangers are the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Euroopa
programme.desc: Europes mountains may offer incredible views, but they are rarely an easy place to live. Golden eagles must soar high over the Alps to find food, while stags in the Scottish Highlands battle it out for valuable grazing land. Kidnapping is rife among Gibraltars Barbary macaques, and - in Norways high plateaus - musk oxen cant escape the harsh merciless winter. Faced with rugged landscapes and extreme weather conditions, Europes high-altitude animals must either adapt… or die trying.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Few of Europes countries boast the wide and wondrous variety of animals found in Greece. Its mainland is dubbed the Serengeti of Europe, while the coast is home to Europes largest marine reserve. Greece is a land brimming with natural treasures. programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins

National Geographic Explorer Bertie Gregory embeds with an Antarctic colony and encounters social skills never filmed before. As the planet rapidly warms, he discovers bonds forged from birth between family, friends and strangers are the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins
programme.desc: It takes a special type of courageous penguin to survive the fierce Southern Ocean, but forty million crowd its isolated, rocky outposts.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: From a harrowing farrowing to an emergency kidding, the vets pull off miracles! Theres no pause in paws as Dr. Brenda and Dr. Lisa treat a variety of foot injuries, including a Sheltie with broken toes. Dr. Pol examines a massive mastiff with tummy trouble and an injured rabbit. The Pol family add a pregnant Friesian mare to the herd and Dr. Nicole has her hands full with a rooster and a cat.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: Tricky cases need PVS treatment during a spooky Halloween season! Dr. Pol aids a pot-bellied pig that was attacked by two dogs. A descendant of racehorse Secretariat has a problematic ear issue. A stalled laboring Lab brings a bunch of adorable puppies into the world. And, Dr. Pol helps a sweet kitten find a new home.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble! From brawling birds to hurting hooves, the vets swing into action mending paws, jaws, even a down on his luck duck. Doc wages an epic battle to save a cow struggling to give birth, Dr. Lisa treats a Husky hit by a truck, and Dr. Nicole examines a pack of puppies with a plethora of problems. The Pols welcome their newest fur baby, Christy, a rambunctious Bengal kitten.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: The parched lands of the Iberian Peninsula give rise to snow-covered peaks, expanses of rare cork oak, and Europes only fog forest. Unique habitats, where species found nowhere else on earth fight for survival. Male Iberian Ibex face-off over females, a whiskered tern chick braves predator-infested waters, and settling the score for the Macaques of Gibraltar calls for kidnap.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Germany is Europes most populous nation. A land hewn by mighty rivers and cloaked in forest. In these wild spaces, nature is full of surprises. From the Bavarian mountains to the North Sea, over a third of the country is now protected. Huge Grey Seals battle to breed, Marmots and Squirrels flee aerial invaders, and elusive Lynx and Moose - once hunted out - re-assert their grip.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Few of Europes countries boast the wide and wondrous variety of animals found in Greece. Its mainland is dubbed the Serengeti of Europe, while the coast is home to Europes largest marine reserve. Greece is a land brimming with natural treasures. Hidden hunters feast on migrating birds, a scorpion searches for his soulmate, and young seal pups venture out into the unknown.

programme.title: Euroopa
programme.desc: With leopards in its mountains, blue whales off its coasts, and foxes roaming its city centres, Europe is a continent full of wild surprises. From the frozen glaciers of Iceland to the lush islands of the Azores, and from the rugged peaks of the Caucasus to the metropolis of London, the first episode in this stunning series highlights Europes astonishing diversity, all shot with breath-taking brio and the latest technology to reveal the continent and its animals in all its breath-taking glory.

programme.title: Euroopa
programme.desc: Europes mountains may offer incredible views, but they are rarely an easy place to live. Golden eagles must soar high over the Alps to find food, while stags in the Scottish Highlands battle it out for valuable grazing land. Kidnapping is rife among Gibraltars Barbary macaques, and - in Norways high plateaus - musk oxen cant escape the harsh merciless winter. Faced with rugged landscapes and extreme weather conditions, Europes high-altitude animals must either adapt… or die trying.

programme.title: Euroopa
programme.desc: Europe is a continent of diversity, and its coasts are no exception. From the frozen Arctic Ocean, where polar bears and reindeer battle for survival, to the warm beaches of the Mediterranean, home to pink flamingos and killer corals, Europes coastline attracts a staggering array of wildlife. Its also the setting for some of the worlds most jaw-dropping natural spectacles, including orcas and humpback whales hunting side by side, and wild horses running free on the beaches of the Camargue.

programme.title: Wild Transylvania
programme.desc: Draculas Transylvania lair is brimming with amazing wildlife. Shielded by the Carpathian Mountains, its a pristine wonderland that remains unchanged since the Middle Ages. Home to 26 species of bats, his kingdom is truly a night flyers paradise. Chamois, cuckoos, Ural owls, wild boar, lynx, brown bears, and huge wolf packs also thrive in a natural world beyond Bram Stokers imagination.

programme.title: Uus metsik Euroopa
programme.desc: Raisakotkad on oma valimuse ja toiduvaliku tõttu inimeste jaoks eemaletõukavad linnud, kuid okosusteemis on nad asendamatu tahtsusega. Raisakotkaste kadumine on mitmes piirkonnas toiduahela lõhkunud ja paljud liigid ohtu seadnud. Õnneks on Bulgaarias alustatud uue programmiga, mis peaks raipesoojad valjasuremisest paastma.

From the Bavarian mountains to the North Sea, over a third of the country is now protected. Huge Grey Seals battle to breed, Marmots and Squirrels flee aerial invaders, and elusive Lynx and Moose - once hunted out - re-assert their grip.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Few of Europes countries boast the wide and wondrous variety of animals found in Greece. Its mainland is dubbed the Serengeti of Europe, while the coast is home to Europes largest marine reserve. Greece is a land brimming with natural treasures. Hidden hunters feast on migrating birds, a scorpion searches for his soulmate, and young seal pups venture out into the unknown.

programme.title: Euroopa
programme.desc: With leopards in its mountains, blue whales off its coasts, and foxes roaming its city centres, Europe is a continent full of wild surprises. From the frozen glaciers of Iceland to the lush islands of the Azores, and from the rugged peaks of the Caucasus to the metropolis of London, the first episode in this stunning series highlights Europes astonishing diversity, all shot with breath-taking brio and the latest technology to reveal the continent and its animals in all its breath-taking glory.

programme.title: Euroopa
programme.desc: Europes mountains may offer incredible views, but they are rarely an easy place to live. Golden eagles must soar high over the Alps to find food, while stags in the Scottish Highlands battle it out for valuable grazing land. Kidnapping is rife among Gibraltars Barbary macaques, and - in Norways high plateaus - musk oxen cant escape the harsh merciless winter. Faced with rugged landscapes and extreme weather conditions, Europes high-altitude animals must either adapt… or die trying.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Few of Europes countries boast the wide and wondrous variety of animals found in Greece. Its mainland is dubbed the Serengeti of Europe, while the coast is home to Europes largest marine reserve. Greece is a land brimming with natural treasures. Hidden hunters feast on migrating birds, a scorpion searches for his soulmate, and young seal pups venture out into the unknown.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins
programme.desc: The emperors are the largest and strongest of all penguins, living in the coldest, most extreme place on Earth. National Geographic Explorer Bertie Gregory embeds with an Antarctic colony and encounters social skills never filmed before. As the planet rapidly warms, he discovers bonds forged from birth between family, friends and strangers are the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Euroopa
programme.desc: With leopards in its mountains, blue whales off its coasts, and foxes roaming its city centres, Europe is a continent full of wild surprises. From the frozen glaciers of Iceland to the lush islands of the Azores, and from the rugged peaks of the Caucasus to the metropolis of London, the first episode in this stunning series highlights Europes astonishing diversity, all shot with breath-taking brio and the latest technology to reveal the continent and its animals in all its breath-taking glory.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: We will travel from South to North and explore the remotest corners of the Appalachian Trail and meet the scientists fighting to keep this wilderness wild.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: Death Valley National Park is a land of extremes, at one time the hottest single location on the planet.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Terrible Parents. Ryan Reynolds reveals some highly questionable parenting strategies from the animal kingdoms worst parents, the underdogs, from a goose who lays their eggs on the top of a cliff to a koala that feeds its baby poop.

programme.title: Wild Transylvania
programme.desc: Draculas Transylvania lair is brimming with amazing wildlife. Shielded by the Carpathian Mountains, its a pristine wonderland that remains unchanged since the Middle Ages. Home to 26 species of bats, his kingdom is truly a night flyers paradise. Chamois, cuckoos, Ural owls, wild boar, lynx, brown bears, and huge wolf packs also thrive in a natural world beyond Bram Stokers imagination.

programme.title: Mara
programme.desc: Part 2 sets the scene, now the zebras wander off, a striped echo of part one. If the first episode is dusted in browns and yellows, this is green as the landscape changes and the rain turn again, rising rivers, making it difficult for everyone again, flooding, rushing waters in a raging torrent. Paradise it may be, but it is a harsh paradise. As the rains clear, we catch up with another character introduced in the first episode, our serval mother that had her den flooded; but she reveals that she has survived. And so has her cub - a miracle under these circumstances.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Terrible Parents. Ryan Reynolds reveals some highly questionable parenting strategies from the animal kingdoms worst parents, the underdogs, from a goose who lays their eggs on the top of a cliff to a koala that feeds its baby poop.

programme.title: Lennujaama turvateenistus
programme.desc: Kolumbia suurima lennujaama El Doroado narkovastase võitluse tootajad peavad pidevalt suutma kohaneda kartellide uha oskuslikumate narkosmugeldamise meetoditega.

programme.title: Puudmaks smugeldajat
programme.desc: St. Louisi linnaosas viib sisejulgeolekuamet labi varjatud operatsiooni, et laiali luua kohtinguvagistamise narkootikume levitav kuritegelik ettevõte. San Ysidros peatab tolli- ja piirivalve kokaiiniga koormatud sõiduki, mis uritab riiki siseneda. Dullesi rahvusvahelises lennujaamas tuvastab Beaglei brigaad ohte, et kaitsta USA põllumajandust.

programme.title: Hispaania Pirivalve
programme.desc: Puhaste randade ja kristallselge vee poolest tuntud Baleaari saarte ametivõimud peavad tegutsema, et võidelda liigse turismiga, mis kohalikke maastikke ohustab. Hiljem riskivad kaks alaealist ebaseaduslikku kalapuuki harrastades oma eluga.

programme.title: Hispaania Pirivalve
programme.desc: Hispaania rannavalvurid avastavad uue smugeldajate strateegia - uimastipakid jaetakse pikaks ajaks vee alla. Madridis puuavad agendid leida narkoallveelaeva, mis arvatavasti Colombiast koos kokaiiniga lahkus. Hiljem tegelevad turvameeskonnad Costa Doradas ohtlikke olukordi tekitavate jetisõitjatega.

programme.title: Hangeldamist uurib Mariana Van Zeller
programme.desc: Vaikeses Georgia linnas toimunud kartellimõrv viib Mariana uurima Mehhiko organiseeritud kuritegevuse tegelikku ulatust Ameerikas. Tulemused on ehmatavad. Ta paljastab - uurides sadu vaikelinna narkojõuke ja kõrgetasemelist korruptsiooni - kuidas kartellid veavad narkootikume, pesevad miljardeid ja imbuvad lausa õiguskaitseorganitesse. Kartellide mõjuvõim on uha suurenemas, põhjustades riigis vagivalla ja sõltuvuse kasvu.

programme.title: Hangeldamist uurib Mariana Van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana uurib uut surmavat fentanuulikokteili nimega tranq dope, mis laastab Ameerika tarbijaid. Ta on oma karjaari jooksul kajastanud riigi surmavat opioidide kriisi, kuid pole iial midagi nii hullu nainud. Vastuseid otsides suundub Mariana Mehhiko kartellide sudamesse Sinaloasse, kus teeb ehmatava avastuse.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: TransAiri lennd 810 stardib Honolulust ja pilootidel on raske kaubalennukit õhus hoida. Peagi on nende ainus võimalus Boeing 737 Vaiksesse ookeani kukutada. Tanu dramaatilisele paasteoperatsioonile jaavad mõlemad piloodid ellu. Nad arvavad, et mootorid utlesid korraga ules, aga kui vrakk veest valja tõmmatakse, raagivad asitõendid midagi muud.

programme.title: Lollid ja teadus
programme.desc: Selles osas saame teada, et enese lolliks tegemiseks, vigastamiseks ja alandamiseks on palju võimalusi naiteks kividel turnides või sõbra nakku torti luues.

programme.title: Hammastav inseneriteadus
programme.desc: Richard Hammond randab otsima hammastavaid inseneriteaduslikke seoseid Troll A gaasiplatvormi rajamise taustal. See on suurim objekt, mida inimene on Maal paigast liigutanud.

programme.title: Hammastav inseneriteadus
programme.desc: Richard Hammond avastab inseneriteaduse inspiratsiooniallikaid, mis aitasid luua maailma uhe suurema ja tihedama liiklusega, Hong Kongi rahvusvahelise lennujaama, mis asub spetsiaalselt selleks rajatud saarel.

programme.title: Hammastav inseneriteadus
programme.desc: Richard Hammond avastab inseneriteaduse inspiratsiooniallikaid, mis aitasid luua maailma pikimat maanteesilda - Millau viadukti Prantsusmaal. Ta laseb kolmveerandil miljonil voldil vabaneda oma sõrmeotstest, et naha, kuidas lõikab valgu energia metallkonstruktsioone kiiresti ja korralikult.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Viimase jaaaja lõpus migreerusid esimesed inimesed Põhja- ja Lõuna-Ameerikasse. Mõned usuvad, et nad reisisid mooda maad, kuid nuud uurivad arheoloogid rannikut. Ning mida utleb meile 13 000 aasta vanune Mehhiko džunglist leitud luukere nende inimeste ja nende maailma kohta? Lastes veest tuhjaks sugava maa-aluse koopa, paljastame uue teaduse, mis on umber kirjutamas esimeste inimeste ajalugu Uues Maailmas.

programme.title: Kuivendatud ookean
programme.desc: Veneetsia, kunagi tuntud kui Aadria mere kuninganna, vallutas Vahemere idaosa, kuid kuidas võimaldas tema laevastik saada tal mereimpeeriumiks? 14. sajandi sõjagaleeri vrakk paljastab Veneetsia meresõidusaladused; kaubalaevade vrakid naitavad, kuidas Veneetsiast sai majanduslik suurvõim ja kuidas Veneetsia saarelt avastatud massihauad paljastavad, kuidas Veneetsia astus vastamisi vastasega, keda isegi tema ei suutnud alistada.

programme.title: Ekstreemne ellujaamine
programme.desc: Hazen Audel uhineb Ida-Siberi rahva evengidega Mongoolia metsades, kus ta õpib sõitma põhjapõtradega ja neid kaitsma karude ning ilveste eest pimedatel oodel. Kui kaks põtra lahevad kaduma, suundub Hazel iseehitatud kasepuust kanuus allavoolu, seejarel uletab sugavaid saaserohkeid rabasid, et põdrad kinni puuda ja tagasi karja juurde tuua. Terve see aeg peab ta ellujaamiseks rakendama evengide tavasid.

programme.title: Ekstreemne ellujaamine
programme.desc: Hazen reisib Malai poolsaarele Mani hõimu juurde. Need põlised kutid-korilased kasutavad traditsioonilisi puhkpusse, millest tulistatakse murgiotsaga nooli. Hazen soovib jahiseltskonnaga liituda, kuid peab enne uksi keerulises looduses toime tulema, et tõestada oma sitkust. Ohtlikus piirkonnas asuvad vertikaalsed kivikaljud, metsikud džunglielevandid ja isegi tiigrid, nii et iga samm võib jaada tema viimaseks.

programme.title: Paastjad talvistel teedel
programme.desc: Politsei survestas Thordi, et ta paastaks veoauto, mis blokeeris ekspressmaanteel tunnelit. Bjoern seejarel aitab valja veoauto, mis libises kiilasjaa tõttu teelt maha - kuid ta satub ohtu, kui veoautod satuvad uksteisele liiga lahedale. Kaugel põhjas satuvad Jo Roger ja Ole Henrik ohtu, kui nad proovivad valja tõmmata teelt valja sõitnud veoautot.

programme.title: Paastjad talvistel teedel
programme.desc: Puksiirautofirma juht Thord hingab kergendatult, kui parast sooja perioodi, mil paasteoperatsioone eriti ei vajatud, hakkab lund sadama. 20-tonnine veok libiseb lumetormis teelt valja ning auto kukub sugavasse kraavi. Thord otsustab mõlemad paasta. Mees peab oma ari toos hoidmiseks vastu võtma kõik tood. Bjorni piirkonnas on valismaalasest autojuht maeahelikus lõksu jaanud. Ta on jatnud rehvidele ketid kinnitamata, mis teeb Bjorni pahuraks.

programme.title: Paastjad talvistel teedel
programme.desc: Jaatmetega taidetud tsisternveok libiseb kitsal, jaisel maenõlval tagasi, olles aarepealt lumega kaetud autole otsa sõitmas. Olukord on pingeline ja sunnib Thordi oma kerget pikapi kasutama - kuid uksainus vaaratus võib muuta selle paasteoperatsiooni katastroofiks. Puksiirijuht Marius peatub Overhallas teel lõunasse Jo Rogeri garaažis. Kuid kui kulastus katkestatakse hadaabikõnega, kutsub Jo Roger Mariuse paasteoperatsiooniga liituma. 10-minutiline kohvipaus muutub pingeliseks ootooks.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: 25. mai 1979. American Airlinesi reis 191 McDonnell Douglas DC-10 on asja Chicagos õhku tõusnud ning mõne sekundi parast kukub lennuki vasak mootor kuljest. Meeskond kaotab lennuki ule kontrolli ja see kukub mõne hetkega alla. 273 inimest saab surma. See on USA ajaloo ohvriterohkeim lennuõnnetus.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: "Lennuõnnetuste uurimine" heidab koos kaasahaaravate taaslavastuste ja tipptasemel arvutigraafikaga valgust legendaarsetele lennunduskatastroofidele.

programme.title: Lennuõnnetuste uurimine
programme.desc: 2013. aasta 6. juulil juhtub San Francisco lennuvaljal õnnetus Air Asiana lennuga 214. Lahem uurimine viib asjaoludeni, mis võinuks seada ohtu palju lennureisijaid kogu maailmas.

programme.title: Tsiviliseerimata saar
programme.desc: Kui Port Protectioni elanikud uhendavad jõud, et viia pea 500-kilone saeveski Carli ja Morgani kinnistule, langetab Squibb ohtlikke puid, et saada rohkem paikesevalgust oma paikeseenergiasusteemi laiendamiseks. Sam, Oli ja Bre alustavad lunastuseks kaeluskaru jahti. Uustulnuk Veronica kasutab ara Jiggy teadmisi, et õppida kalapuugis olulist oskust.

programme.title: Tsiviliseerimata saar
programme.desc: Veronica vajab linna naiste abi, kuna kardab suuri puid langetada. Samil ja Squibbil ei lahe kalavõrkudega õnneks ja nad peavad varske kala saamiseks teisi mooduseid kasutama. Oliver võtab oma kuuril katuse maha, et panna paika vihmavee kogumise susteem. Carl ja Morgan astuvad unistuste kodu suunas jargmise sammu ja ehitavad omale aia.

programme.title: Paastjad talvistel teedel
programme.desc: Puksiirautokangelastel on uus vaenlane: aarmuslikud ilmastikutingimused. Ootamatud temperatuurikõikumised seavad jaatee paastetootajad silmitsi ennenagematute valjakutsetega.

programme.title: Paastjad talvistel teedel
programme.desc: Jaatmetega taidetud tsisternveok libiseb kitsal, jaisel maenõlval tagasi, olles aarepealt lumega kaetud autole otsa sõitmas. Olukord on pingeline ja sunnib Thordi oma kerget pikapi kasutama - kuid uksainus vaaratus võib muuta selle paasteoperatsiooni katastroofiks. Puksiirijuht Marius peatub Overhallas teel lõunasse Jo Rogeri garaažis. Kuid kui kulastus katkestatakse hadaabikõnega, kutsub Jo Roger Mariuse paasteoperatsiooniga liituma. 10-minutiline kohvipaus muutub pingeliseks ootooks.

programme.title: Paastjad talvistel teedel
programme.desc: Kui maalihe havitas kaugel metsateel ekskavaatori, uhendavad Thord ja Bjoern jõud. Kuid kui ebastabiiline pinnas seab paasteoperatsiooni ohtu, muutub missioon 12-paevaseks katsumuseks. Oddas, parast jarjekordset maalihet, kardab Domenic fjordi puhitud autot paastes vette kukkuda. Tuhat kilomeetrit põhja pool, Overhallas, satub Torstein kahe probleemi keskele, kui veok ja sõiduauto põrkuvad kokku samas kohas.

programme.title: Paastjad talvistel teedel
programme.desc: Politsei survestas Thordi, et ta paastaks veoauto, mis blokeeris ekspressmaanteel tunnelit. Bjoern seejarel aitab valja veoauto, mis libises kiilasjaa tõttu teelt maha - kuid ta satub ohtu, kui veoautod satuvad uksteisele liiga lahedale. Kaugel põhjas satuvad Jo Roger ja Ole Henrik ohtu, kui nad proovivad valja tõmmata teelt valja sõitnud veoautot.
